title: 94: Chatty Broads: The BTS Anniversary Special
itunes:title: 94: Chatty Broads: The BTS Anniversary Special
description:
Happy 1 year anniversary, #broadsquad! The Broads celebrate their first full year hosting the podcast by talking all about the backstory, how it really got started, how they felt about each other - and they chat behind the scenes in the podcast world, their personal lives the past years, favorite and most awkward episodes and more! PS. WE LOVE YOU BROAD SQUAD AND COULD NOT BE MORE GRATEFUL FOR EACH AND EVERY ONE OF YOU! 
THANK YOU TO OUR SPONSORS: 
*** SKILLSHARE: go to Skillshare.com/ (http://skillshare.com/) CHATTY to start your two free months with unlimited access now!
*** DHM DETOX: Our podcast listeners get 20% off their order - go to DHMdetox.com (http://dhmdetox.com/) and use promo code "CHATTY” at checkout!
*** OSHOT by OMAX: go to omaxhealth.com (http://omaxhealth.com/) and enter code “chatty” to get 20% off O-Shot and all OMAX products sitewide!
*** STAMPS.COM (http://stamps.com/) : get a 4-week trial PLUS free postage and a digital scale by going to Stamps.com (http://stamps.com/) clicking on the Microphone at the TOP of the homepage and typing in CHATTY.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
